website_summaries.verdict: Ergonomic rubber grips make this slicer a good choice for  adults, but don't expect children to be able to use it to make their own snacks.
pros: Extra-thick restaurant quality stainless steel blades will slice and core apples up to 3.5" wide
cons: Requires too much force for children to use to cut their own apples

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen needs this gadget!
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this apple corer/slicer makes it so easy to do a whole bag of apples in a short time, used to take me an hour to cut and core a bag of apples, now it takes me 5seconds to cut each one into ready to eat slices. Great for mass cutting or single serving. Easy to clean and store. I've owned mine for a few years no rust and it still looks new and works great. This is a must get gadget.
customer_reviews.author: Kymi

customer_reviews.title: Apple of my eye
customer_reviews.text: Apologies for Delayed Response. There was a LOT going on when my Slicer was Delivered. It got tossed in my KitchenGadgetsDrawer... and forgotten about. Today was the very first time I tried it. AWESOMESauce!!! Cutting up my apples has always been the bane of my SmoothieRoutine. Not anymore! My Slicer performed exactly as described... If not better. My 5-10minute Slicing ordeal (including picking out seeds and core pieces) was instantly "cut" to 2 SECONDS! NoMuss/NoFuss... No picking necessary. THANKYou for this Most Excellent work saver.
customer_reviews.author: D. Long

customer_reviews.title: Cheap
customer_reviews.text: This is cheap feeling and actually really really small. Maybe it's for miniature apples? I was hoping to replace a dull all stainless apple slicer, but this one just won't do it.
customer_reviews.author: CBergs

customer_reviews.title: great apple slicer
customer_reviews.text: i had a problem with the first apple slicer i received. it didn't slice very well, and i wrote the seller about this. they immediately sent out another slicer which is working perfectly, making my 'apple a day' extremely easy to slice. customer service was incredible.
customer_reviews.author: jax

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: We like the general design of these Apple Slicers although I do not feel the manufacturing precision is as tight as the other 2 Slicers we have. The ends of course the center ring overlap and actually have a space between them which makes it harder to clean. We use it and it works.
customer_reviews.author: BookMARK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size and Shape
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, and less core wastage. I've bought my first apple cutter in William Sonoma, I liked the material used to prepare the apple cutter but my complain with that is the slices are really thin. I guess they are suitable for children but for an Adult we have to take two slices at a time also the core is big, so a lot of wastage in one apple. The one from Dynamics is well engineered for perfect size and also, less core is designed to decrease the wastage. I've bought this for myself and as gifts. Feels solid in hands and has good grips on sides.
customer_reviews.author: R@j

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather use a knife
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality to the touch, but like every other slicer, it does not cut all the way through. It is very hard to get started. It is easier to use a knife. This is extremely frustrating for me and my 8yr child who daily helps me cook.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzy MacCleary

customer_reviews.title: Works as designed!
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy tool to quickly slice my apples and I stand corrected on the design. Since I rent I always use a cutting board so I would have preferred to have it cut all the way through however the design is meant to not cut all the way to the bottom as to protect the counter or kitchen surface. And that makes sense because this is a tool that you can use anywhere: camping, BBQ's, picnics, etc. Knowledge is power!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Design Flaw
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing this product, I find that I am not a fan. The design could be improved by making it just a little more curved at the bottom so that it slices the Apple entirely. I find that no matter how hard I press the blades do not go through to the bottom because the sides are flush with the depth of the cutting edge. I am left pulling out the slices and twisting or mangling the still connected skin. Needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey V. Crabtree

customer_reviews.title: Tricky slice
customer_reviews.text: Using this slicer takes some practice and leverage. My kids, 11 and 13, begged me to buy it for them. The 11 year old, 4'7", does not use it much because it takes more effort than shown on the product videos. My 13 year old, 5'4", uses it more often, with no complaints. PROS: Good quality. CONS: Can be challenging to use if you do not place it at the proper height, on a non slip surface.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Best I've tried
customer_reviews.text: Best one among the number of different models I've used over the years. As I see it, there are two critical factors for these: 1) sharpness of the blades; 2) size of the core hole (too small and you get too much core; too large and you lose too much meat). This model rates high on both of the factors.
customer_reviews.author: someone

customer_reviews.title: So I don’t use it as often as I would like because it doesn’t fit
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t work with larger apples. So I don’t use it as often as I would like because it doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: DuraMtr

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The apple slicer works as expected. No complaints. I am most impressed by the manufacturer! Before the slicer arrived, I received an email from the manufacturer giving washing instructions, etc. They also contacted me later to be sure the slicer was working up to my expectations. Excellent customer service! I've never ordered anything from Amazon where the manufacturer contacts you
customer_reviews.author: Precious Jewel

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I found that it performs with ease. All you do is line it up and push down. I slices through with no problem. Cleanup is easy. Just rinse and it's ready for use. It's very sturdy and it would be very hard to break in my opinion. Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian J. Stith

customer_reviews.title: "Slices real good"
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my husband, who eats an apple just about every night before bed. Asked for his feedback for this review: "slices real good". He does not beat around the bush, nor does he need to slice an apple with a knife anymore thanks to the Dynamic Chef Apple Slicer. Seriously though, it's great. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren V

customer_reviews.title: and they easily drop and separate
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't take much force to push this slicer through a firm apple, partly because it's very sharp but also because the wider sides help with leverage. To dislodge the slices, push them down from the top side (away from the sharp bottom blades), and they easily drop and separate. This is a great kitchen tool, far superior to the old slicers I've used.
customer_reviews.author: kccoed

customer_reviews.title: Works great, doesn't cut apple fully through
customer_reviews.text: Works great, doesn't cut apple fully through, but I've found that with a little tugging, the apple pieces will easily fall apart. That only little extra effort is the only thing keeping it from being 5 stars, but I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Les B

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: I really love this product. I've had two other apple slicers in the past before ordering this one. One was a little hard to push down and get the apple cut and the second one I had was slippery when you held it. This one has the black grip for your hands and cuts the apples easily so it handled both problem I had with previous slicers. I'd definitely recommend this product to others!
customer_reviews.author: Jianine

customer_reviews.title: Love this tool
customer_reviews.text: Love this tool! I can’t belive I’ve never had one before now. Makes cutting apples for the kids so much quicker & easier. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Katy Allard

customer_reviews.title: It's an apple slicer and does what it's made for.
customer_reviews.text: It's an apple slicer, what more do you need to know? Good quality, I haven't put it in the dishwasher yet, instead just rinse and clean it in the sink. Has held up with apples, pears. Tried a tomato just to see what happens, just flattens it rather than cuts it. All in all it does what it's made for.
customer_reviews.author: KDEL

customer_reviews.title: This one stays together..not all do. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: I had purchased another corer/slicer of the same design from a discount grocery store. That one lasted 3 apples before it came apart and sliced my hand pretty good. I have done more than a dozen apples with this one so far and it works GREAT. No sign of the blades pulling away from the holder.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: It works, but the blades are not very sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: It works, but the blades are not very sharp and the spacing between the blades seem to be not uniform.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Good and useful.
customer_reviews.text: Cuts apples perfectly. Could have been a little more sharper with slightly thicker/sturdier blades, has room for improvement, hence the 4 stars. Definitely makes you consume more apples, for health conscious people.
customer_reviews.author: PS

customer_reviews.title: Good item to have
customer_reviews.text: Good product, makes coring a apple very easy. Only downside is that I wish the middle was a but wider as some apples are bigger then the space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit small to use
customer_reviews.text: Good to use but might need to be bigger. I can only use it for small apple.
customer_reviews.author: Sungtaek HAN

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this and so do i. Easy to use just a slight push in the beginning. Makes it much cheaper than buying apple slices in sealed bags
customer_reviews.author: Helpful Customer

customer_reviews.title: I received a free replacement from the company when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I received a free replacement from the company when I had to return the first one due to the blades bending. It works well but for oversized apples it is probably too small. This isn't an issue for me as I tend to buy the smaller apples by the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tamera Chan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Nice , quick way to core and cut your apples!
customer_reviews.author: NICOLE

customer_reviews.title: No more apple core.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a 2 minute job and makes it like 5 seconds. Actually takes longer to clean than it does use. Cleaning is easy
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Schafer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: I got this to replace our old apple slicer because it was broken. This one is so much easier to grip and cuts through apples easily. Sure does save time. I am very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Jjkhwaters

customer_reviews.title: and the slices are nice and even
customer_reviews.text: I have smoothies for breakfast every day, and most days put half an apple in it. This slicer is great- goes thru the apple, separates the core from the slices, and the slices are nice and even. So much faster than doing it with a knife, and with the wide rubber handles, no chance of cutting myself. I'm happy I bought it, and would buy it again!
customer_reviews.author: Cinnamon

customer_reviews.title: Eating More Apples Now
customer_reviews.text: Great tool! Strong blades. More likely to eat apples now. Husband loves them cut up. I put a bit of lemon on them and then into a storage container. Easy snack.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rea

customer_reviews.title: Dollar store quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality for the price point. It is as durable as the ones you can buy at Ikea for a fraction of the cost. The blade to slice the apple is not sharp enough to go all the way through.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: Great slicer
customer_reviews.text: This is a really quality apple slicer. Very easy to use, clean and store. It cites an Apple perfectly. We are very happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Contrucci

customer_reviews.title: But I have to report this one is a waste of money Please don't buy it
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't write a product review on amazon. But I have to report this one is a waste of money Please don't buy it. This is not working. I bought a better one from TJ MAXX in another brand. I wasted my 7 dollars for this.
customer_reviews.author: Bepa

customer_reviews.title: This broke within a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product, until it broke within a year. We do go through a lot of apples in our house, but I would still expect something like this to last for a few years.
customer_reviews.author: sgub

customer_reviews.title: as it is not razor sharp like good quality knives
customer_reviews.text: You have to "rock" it back and forth to get it to cut, as it is not razor sharp like good quality knives, but it works. I don't know how I lived without it, before I purchased this.
customer_reviews.author: Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this apple slicer! It is sturdier than other ones I have purchased in the past. I particularly like the handles on it. The handles are positioned to give the user more leverage in pushing down on the apple to slice it. As a result, the process is easier, faster, and slices are more even. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Tom in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Good product that gets lots of use!
customer_reviews.text: Had this for a few months now. It worked great when we first got it, and it still works ok now but after a couple months it is getting dull. Still a great product though. We use it almost every day. My kids love Apple slices and peanut butter.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron and Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Works great, and the people who started the company contacted ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the people who started the company contacted me via email to make sure everything was perfect. They were very friendly and the product does what it's intended to do without any difficulty.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Adam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Cuts right through an apple with ease! My wife loves it for making her world famous apple cakes! Very durable and seems like it would last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jim S.

customer_reviews.title: I've also started to eat healthier with more apples since it's so easy to cut them
customer_reviews.text: This makes my life so much easier, I am never cutting an apple without it again. I've also started to eat healthier with more apples since it's so easy to cut them!
customer_reviews.author: Shahd El-Alfy

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing, i am not compairing it to anything because i never owned one before, but this sure beats cutting apples with a knife, very well built, not sure if should have been sharper but it works perfect every time
customer_reviews.author: Straight

customer_reviews.title: Apple Corer
customer_reviews.text: This little device cores the apple nicely, making it easy to munch each piece!
customer_reviews.author: barbara

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend, who refuses to cut his own apples. Great product and can even cut bigger apples. We use this daily at my house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why did i wait!
customer_reviews.text: I finally bought one! with a 5 year old, I'm not sure why I waited so long. It does take a little pressure to push down, but so far I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good product, excellent service.  Works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased because my doctor said I should eat more fruit. Slices perfectly and the core is easy to remove. Blades actually have edges on them as opposed to being thin pieces of metal that you force through the apple. Recommend it to anyone looking for an apple slicer.
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: This is great, very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is great, very easy to use. I even came downstairs one morning and found my kids eating an apple all cut up. I asked them how they did it and my son told me he pulled out the apple slicer. I was pleasantly surprised.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It slices apples... yep.
customer_reviews.text: It slices... it dices...handles are good sized. Feel like you have control
customer_reviews.author: SteampunkPhotos

customer_reviews.title: Its OK
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough for honey crisp apples, had to buy a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Wallace

customer_reviews.title: ... all the other ones this one held up really good I'm very happy with it it seems very sturdy ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this apple slicer because I keep breaking all the other ones this one held up really good I'm very happy with it it seems very sturdy I've been using it for a good two to three months now and haven't had any problems

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great way 2 enjoy apples, it's so sharp & slice easily, thx you for a cool tool!

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Great apple slicer! Easy to use, love the comfy handles. SOOOOO much better than the all-metal one I previously owned. Very sturdy, I expect it to last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Makes nice uniform slices. After you push it down you need to wriggle the slices so it cuts/breaks the bottom part of the apple slices. Is there another way to finish the cut?
customer_reviews.author: Dreamtime

customer_reviews.title: 5 Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little gadget. It works like a charm to slice and core apples. Zip zip and you're ready to enjoy a beautiful crunchy apple. Highly recommend.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Makes things much easier with apples in the kitchen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Sharp, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's sharp but I wish it came with a base so I don't have to pull anything out to put under it.

customer_reviews.text: I juice a lot so this tool saves me time when I have to juice up to 10 apples and don't have time to sit and tediously cut each one.

product_meta.title: Dynamic Chef Apple Slicer - Stainless Steel Apple Corer - up to 3.5 Inch Apples - 8 Slices - Comfortable Sturdy Rubber Grips
feature_bullets: ★ HOW WE’RE DIFFERENT: Your apple doesn't stand a chance against this guy. Dynamic Chef brand stainless steel apple slicer / corer is built to last. Comfortable, sharp and sturdy. Much more comfortable than other brands.

★ THE PERFECT HOLIDAY GIFT: The perfect holiday gift, Christmas gift, Hanukkah, Black Friday, Cyber Monday and New Years! Extra thick 100% restaurant quality stainless steel, ergonomic rubber grips will slice and cores apples up to 3 ½ inches wide, consistently every time! Remove the core and slice 8 perfect slices for dipping, baking, and more.

★ CUSTOMER CARE PROMISE: Lifestyle Dynamics offers complete customer satisfaction, period. Our reviews speak for themselves. If for any reason you are not absolutely happy with your slicer we will replace or refund your order, no questions asked. CONTACT US directly and we will take care of you. We love to help!
★ MULTI-UNIT DISCOUNTS: Scroll down to the Special Offers & Product Promotions area below. Up to 25% off of today’s order!
